feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Make bigint fields return as string values when fetched through relationships. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15053
  • Update pro ref by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15088
  • Removing Datasource plus query API by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15085
  • Remove exited containers when running tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15089
  • Always use the current docker context. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15090
  • Bigint cleanup by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15087
  • Clean unused scripts by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15080
  • Remove rollup from bbui by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15074

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.14...3.2.15

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix/loop context lost when max iterations are reached. Add/test casesâ€¦ by @imnaveenk in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15091
  • Feature flag zod by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15095
  • Validation for search api by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14757
  • Don't fetch account for identifyTenantGroup posthog event by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15092
  • Patch row improvements by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14949

New Contributors

  • @imnaveenk made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15091

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.16...3.2.17

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enrich the datasource when not passing the datasource ID. by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15102

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.17...3.2.18

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.19
entry.content:

  • Migrate / add some more automation tests by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15086

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.18...3.2.19
